page.title: 19The Guy Carnival
page.content: Although it is not directly begun in our grids,we felt that it was important to mention one of the most notable{local events}which takes part in our area. This is the Guy carnival,which takes place on the first Saturday before November the Fifth,in memory of the Gunpowder plot. It attracts thousands of people from the surrounding districts,and features around 15 or 20 'floats' which are all constructed and planned in the period just before the event.One of it's reasons for such popularity,is that each of the float's is based around a topical event many of them local matters of interest. Indeed there is also a magazine full of{local opinions}and remarks which are called{pithy parrs}and are pointed barbs aimed at someone locally.
